definitions: a small black fly, the female of which sucks blood and can transmit a number of serious human and animal diseases. Large swarms sometimes cause distress to livestock and humans.

notes.text: Family Simuliidae: Simulium and other genera

definitions: a black or dark green aphid that is a common pest of crops and gardens.

notes.text: Several species in the family Aphididae, in particular Aphis fabae

shortDefinitions: black or dark green aphid that is common pest of crops and gardens
